title: Must be level 6 or higher to post
body: Okay I am level 30 IN GAME but it won't let me post a discussion in Team Recruitment?

replies.body:
It seems there's a sync issue between your Summoner and Boards profiles. I'd recommend playing a quick match of League, then [**clear your browser's cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) and log back into the Boards.

Let me know if this worked for you.

Hello,

This has not worked for me.  I am now level 30 and I still can't post a discussion in team recruitment.
